entrypoints.header:
SELECT
  'COSTAL FEEDS' AS report_title,
  'TEMPERATURE REPORT' AS report_subtitle,
  CASE WHEN NULLIF(PARAM:from_date, '') IS NULL
       THEN ''
       ELSE strftime('%d-%m-%Y', datetime(PARAM:from_date, '+330 minutes'))
  END AS report_from_date,
  CASE WHEN NULLIF(PARAM:to_date, '') IS NULL
       THEN ''
       ELSE strftime('%d-%m-%Y', datetime(PARAM:to_date, '+330 minutes'))
  END AS report_to_date,
  strftime('%d-%m-%Y', 'now', 'localtime') AS print_date;
entrypoints.rows:
SELECT
  datetime(timestamp_utc, '+330 minutes') AS row_column_1,
  ROUND(M1A_2_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_2,
  ROUND(M1A_3_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_3,
  ROUND(P3A_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_4,
  ROUND(P4A_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_5,
  ROUND(P5A_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_6,
  ROUND(P6A_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_costal_feeds,
  ROUND(P8A_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_8,
  ROUND(P8A_3_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_9,
  ROUND(P8A_4_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_10,
  ROUND(P8A_DRY_OUT_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_11,
  ROUND(P9A_DRY_OUT_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_12,
  ROUND(ROOM_PT100_PV / 10.0, 1) AS row_column_13
FROM neuract__TEMPERATURES
WHERE date(datetime(timestamp_utc, '+330 minutes')) >= date(datetime(PARAM:from_date, '+330 minutes'))
  AND date(datetime(timestamp_utc, '+330 minutes')) <= date(datetime(PARAM:to_date, '+330 minutes'))
  AND CAST(strftime('%M', datetime(timestamp_utc, '+330 minutes')) AS INTEGER) % 5 = 0
  AND strftime('%S', datetime(timestamp_utc, '+330 minutes')) = '00'
ORDER BY timestamp_utc ASC;
entrypoints.totals:
SELECT
  ROUND(MAX(M1A_2_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_m1a_2,
  ROUND(MAX(M1A_3_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_m1a_3,
  ROUND(MAX(P3A_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p3a,
  ROUND(MAX(P4A_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p4a,
  ROUND(MAX(P5A_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p5a,
  ROUND(MAX(P6A_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p6a,
  ROUND(MAX(P8A_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p8a,
  ROUND(MAX(P8A_3_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p8a_3,
  ROUND(MAX(P8A_4_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p8a_4,
  ROUND(MAX(P8A_DRY_OUT_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p8a_dry,
  ROUND(MAX(P9A_DRY_OUT_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_p9a_dry,
  ROUND(MAX(ROOM_PT100_PV) / 10.0, 1) AS total_max_room
FROM neuract__TEMPERATURES
WHERE date(datetime(timestamp_utc, '+330 minutes')) >= date(datetime(PARAM:from_date, '+330 minutes'))
  AND date(datetime(timestamp_utc, '+330 minutes')) <= date(datetime(PARAM:to_date, '+330 minutes'));

summary.description: Simple direct SELECT from neuract__TEMPERATURES table. Returns raw sensor values as stored.
